decision_conditions: Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) attached to planning permission reference 12853/APP/2023/3720, dated 23-04-24, is amended to the following:
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers
and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions Hillingdon Local Plan Parts 1 (November 2012) and 2 (January 2020) and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the Non-Material Amendments hereby approved, all other conditions relating to planning permission reference 12853/APP/2023/3720, dated 23-04-24, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans are SUPERSEDED by the Non-Material Amendments hereby approved:
The following plans are APPROVED by the Non-Material Amendment application:
description: Section 96a application for Non-Material Amendment to planning permission reference 12853/APP/2023/3720, dated 23-04-24 (External alterations to the existing building, including alterations to selected openings and windows, materials and facade detailing, along with other associated works) to amend Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans), including amendments to the locations of windows, signage and paneling to the facade of the entrance.
